relevant_findings.general: No acute distress, pleasant and conversive.
relevant_findings.chest: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, atrial fibrillation, no murmurs, mechanical heart valve.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, no rebound or guarding, bowel sounds present.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, no edema, bilateral palpable pulses.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Abdominal exam and pain improved, but the patient developed increasing jaundice and a rising bilirubin to >7.
